title: Devasena Kundan Earrings - A Timeless Adornment
materials: Cubic Zirconia. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Intricate Kundan setting with a traditional floral motif. The central oval emerald is surrounded by sparkling rubies and shimmering Cubic Zirconia, creating a captivating contrast. These earrings showcase the artistry of South Indian craftsmanship, blending heritage with modern elegance.The design is light, comfortable, and ideal for all-day wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green (emerald) and red (ruby) accents
complemented by the dazzling white of the Cubic Zirconia. This classic tricolor combination is considered auspicious in South Indian culture.
occasions: and family functions. Ideal for occasions like Seemantham
or as a cherished gift for a loved one. Also suitable for modern formal events where you want to add a touch of ethnic elegance.
description: Embrace the timeless beauty of South Indian tradition with these exquisite Kundan Butta earrings. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and durability. The classic design makes them a versatile addition to any jewelry collection, suitable for both traditional and contemporary styles. The combination of precious and semi-precious stones creates a harmonious balance of luxury and value.
